definition: of or pertaining to or characteristic of the branch of the Protestant Church adhering to the views of Luther
details:
adjective
- of or pertaining to or characteristic of the branch of the Protestant Church adhering to the views of Luther
= example: of or pertaining to or characteristic of the branch of the Protestant Church adhering to the views of Luther
- of or pertaining to Martin Luther or his teachings
= example: of or pertaining to Martin Luther or his teachings
